docs.A: Agency / Action Capacity: action-oriented, responsibility-taking, and plan articulation (e.g., proposing next steps, owning decisions). Higher A pulls state toward POSITIVE.
docs.W: Withdrawal / Avoidance: disengagement, delay, defaulting, and relinquishing choice/control (e.g., 'whatever', 'you decide', 'later'). Higher W pushes state toward NEGATIVE.
docs.E: Extremity / Absolutism: rigid all-or-nothing framing (e.g., always/never/everyone/no one; 二元化/绝对化). Higher E escalates toward NEUROTIC.
docs.H: Hostility / Coercion: coercive control, threats, insults, boundary violations, forced framing (e.g., 'my way or', 'do it now', 人身攻击/要挟). Higher H strongly escalates toward NEUROTIC.
docs.B: Boundary & Respect: scope/constraint clarification, respectful framing, alignment language, conditionality (e.g., clarify scope, respect, align). Higher B restores stability toward POSITIVE.
